All Implemented Interfaces:
Rotatable, Effectable, Anchorable, Bounded, DragRepositoryAccessor, EventInitiator, GameNode, Placeable, Removable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicEllipseEntity
public abstract class EllipseEntity extends CenteredShapeEntity<javafx.scene.shape.Ellipse>
An EllipseEntity provides the option to use a drawable Ellipse as a YaegerEntity. As opposed to some of the other shapes (RectangleEntity, for instance), the reference point of a EllipseEntity is its center.

For an EllipseEntity it is possible to set the x-radius and y-radius, through the methods setRadiusX(double) and setRadiusY(double). By default, both values will be set to 1.

    • EllipseEntity

      protected EllipseEntity(Coordinate2D initialPosition, Size size)
      Create a new EllipseEntity on the given initialPosition with the given Size. Using this constructor results in the same situation as using EllipseEntity(Coordinate2D), setRadiusX(double) and setRadiusY(double), where both the Size.width() and Size.height() are divided by 2.
      Parameters:
      initialPosition - the initial position at which this EllipseEntity should be placed
      size - the Size of this EllipseEntity
